DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Oral AB1010 Adult Patients With Active Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: 1 . Meet American College Rheumatology ( ACR ) criteria RA 2 . Have active RA 3 . ACR functional class IIII 4 . Disease onset > 16 year age 5 . Disease duration least 6 month 6 . Current use DMARD within 4 week ( 5 halflives , whichever long ) screen except leflunomide require specific washout 4 . Any previous use recombinant IL1Ra 5 .
